hooks: "my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored"
"i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found"
csv:
Hook,Slide 1,Slide 2,Slide 3,Slide 4,Slide 5
my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored,"spent 2 years hearing 'it's just arthritis' while barely able to walk","tried everything they suggested: nsaids rest & expensive orthotics","found my old x-ray showing a treatable condition they missed","discovered that 68% of 'aging pain' cases are misdiagnosed","Vibit changed everything - now i garden & dance again without pain"
i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found,"watching my grandkids play while stuck in my chair broke my heart","wasted $3200 on 'senior comfort shoes' that did nothing","my neighbor showed me her before/after foot scans","turns out 'age-related pain' isn't normal - it's treatable","Vibit gave me my life back. now i chase those grandkids everywhere"
